item.title: Licensed Practical Nurse (LPN) - Assisted Living PART TIME at Senior Lifestyle
item.guid: Senior Lifestyle-Licensed Practical Nurse (LPN) - Assisted Living PART TIME-Snellville, GA, US
item.description:
📍 Location: Snellville, GA, US 💼 Type: Fulltime 🏠 Work: On-site
📝 Description: **Company Description**
Do you have HEART? We are looking for individuals who can embrace our mission to purposely brighten and enrich the lives of those we serve with HEART; Hospitality, Excellence, Appreciation, Respect \\& Teamwork.This position is responsible for providing licensed nursing services to residents, following the guidelines provided by Senior Lifestyle Corporation.
**Job Description**
* Responsible for medication administration for the residents in compliance with Federa... 🔗 Apply Direct: https://jobs.smartrecruiters.com/SeniorLifestyle1/744000068891690-licensed-practical-nurse-lpn-assisted-living-part-time 🔗 Job Board: https://www.indeed.com/viewjob?jk=b04afbc7eb6c24a1
